message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $12,000. I think it's a fair price considering what it offers.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more than your offer. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still unable to exceed $8,000 for the product. I hope we can find a mutual agreement.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible here. $9,000 is my final offer - I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your effort to meet me halfway. Unfortunately, I still cannot go above $8,000 for the product. I hope we can come to a satisfactory conclusion.
